languages.text: {n}Паскаль запрокидывает голову, и мощь, переполнявшая его голос, выплескивается вовне. Голос техножреца гремит на весь корабль, подхваченный каждым вокс-динамиком каждой палубы.{/n} "Взглянув в водоворот времен, узрел я темные знаки. Узрел я, что пребываю с техносоратниками своими в плену Цикла, что спиралью уходит в точку небытия. Узрел я неизбежную траекторию гибели и восстал против нее".

{n}Pasqal throws back his head, and the power brimming in his voice rushes forth like a flood. The Tech-Priest's booming voice is heard throughout the ship, echoed by every vox-speaker on every deck.{/n} "I peered into the vortex of time and saw dark omens. I saw that my tech-comrades and I were trapped in the Cycle, spiralling toward nothingness. I saw inevitable doom at the end of that trajectory and rebelled against it."
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль запрокидывает голову, и мощь, переполнявшая его голос, выплескивается вовне. Голос техножреца гремит на весь корабль, подхваченный каждым вокс-динамиком каждой палубы.{/n} "Взглянув в водоворот времен, узрел я темные знаки. Узрел я, что пребываю с техносоратниками своими в плену Цикла, что спиралью уходит в точку небытия. Узрел я неизбежную траекторию гибели и восстал против нее".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal throws back his head, and the power his voice has been brimming with overflows and rushes forth like a flood. The Tech-Priest's booming voice is heard throughout the ship, echoed by every vox-speaker on every deck.{/n} "I peered into the vortex of time and saw dark omens. I saw that my tech-comrades and I were trapped in the Cycle that spiralled toward a point where existence would cease. I saw inevitable doom at the end of that trajectory, and rebelled against it."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルは頭をのけぞらせると、あふれんばかりの力を込めた声を洪水のようにとめどなく発する。技術司祭の声は船中に響き渡り、全デッキの全ヴォクス・スピーカーにこだまする。{/n}「自分は時の渦をのぞき込み、悲劇を予知した。我が技術同胞と自分がサイクルに囚われ、無へと螺旋を描いて落ちる様を。その軌道の終わりに避けられない運命が待つことに気づいた自分は、抵抗した」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal throws back his head, and the power brimming in his voice rushes forth like a flood. The Tech-Priest's booming voice is heard throughout the ship, echoed by every vox-speaker on every deck.{/n} "I peered into the vortex of time and saw dark omens. I saw that my tech-comrades and I were trapped in the Cycle, spiralling toward nothingness. I saw inevitable doom at the end of that trajectory and rebelled against it."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは頭をのけぞらせると、あふれんばかりの力を込めた声を洪水のようにとめどなく発する。技術司祭の声は船中に響き渡り、全デッキの全ヴォクス・スピーカーにこだまする。{/n}「自分は時の渦をのぞき込み、悲劇を予知した。我が技術同胞と自分がサイクルに囚われ、無へと螺旋を描いて落ちる様を。その軌道の終わりに避けられない運命が待つことに気づいた自分は、抵抗した」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡仰起头来，声音中的力量像洪水一样磅礴而出。技术神甫洪亮的声音响彻全舰，回荡在每个甲板的音阵装置中。{/n}“我凝视着时间的漩涡，看到了黑暗的预兆。我看到，我和我的技术伙伴们被困在这个循环中，徘徊往复，走向虚无。在这条轨迹的尽头，我看到了不可避免的毁灭，所以，我选择反抗。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal throws back his head, and the power brimming in his voice rushes forth like a flood. The Tech-Priest's booming voice is heard throughout the ship, echoed by every vox-speaker on every deck.{/n} "I peered into the vortex of time and saw dark omens. I saw that my tech-comrades and I were trapped in the Cycle, spiralling toward nothingness. I saw inevitable doom at the end of that trajectory and rebelled against it."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡仰起头来，声音中的力量像洪水一样磅礴而出。技术祭司洪亮的声音响彻全舰，回荡在每个甲板的音阵装置中。{/n}“我凝视着时间的漩涡，看到了黑暗的预兆。我看到，我和我的技术伙伴们被困在这个循环中，徘徊往复，走向虚无。在这条轨迹的尽头，我看到了不可避免的毁灭，所以，我选择反抗。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal rejette la tête en arrière et toute la puissance de sa voix se déverse dans le vaisseau telle une inondation, relayée par les synthétiseurs-vox sur tous les ponts.{/n} « Le vortex du temps m'a révélé de sombres présages. Je nous ai vus, mes technoconfrères et moi, prisonniers du Cycle, lentement aspirés par le néant. J'ai vu vers quel destin tragique nous menait cette voie, et je me suis rebellé. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal throws back his head, and the power brimming in his voice rushes forth like a flood. The Tech-Priest's booming voice is heard throughout the ship, echoed by every vox-speaker on every deck.{/n} "I peered into the vortex of time and saw dark omens. I saw that my tech-comrades and I were trapped in the Cycle, spiralling toward nothingness. I saw inevitable doom at the end of that trajectory and rebelled against it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal rejette la tête en arrière et toute la puissance de sa voix se déverse dans le vaisseau telle une inondation, relayée par les synthétiseurs-vox sur tous les ponts.{/n} « Le vortex du temps m'a révélé de sombres présages. Je nous ai vus, mes technoconfrères et moi, prisonniers du Cycle, lentement aspirés par le néant. J'ai vu vers quel destin tragique nous menait cette voie, et je me suis rebellé. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal echa la cabeza hacia atrás y el poder que emana de su voz fluye como un torrente de agua. La voz atronadora del tecnosacerdote se escucha en toda la nave, resonando en todos los altavoces de voco de la cubierta.{/n} «He observado el vórtice del tiempo y visto oscuros presagios. Nos he visto a mí y a mis tecnocamaradas atrapados en el Ciclo, avanzando hacia la nada. He visto una maldición inevitable al final de la trayectoria y me he rebelado contra ella».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal throws back his head, and the power brimming in his voice rushes forth like a flood. The Tech-Priest's booming voice is heard throughout the ship, echoed by every vox-speaker on every deck.{/n} "I peered into the vortex of time and saw dark omens. I saw that my tech-comrades and I were trapped in the Cycle, spiralling toward nothingness. I saw inevitable doom at the end of that trajectory and rebelled against it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal echa la cabeza hacia atrás y el poder que emana de su voz fluye como un torrente de agua. La voz atronadora del tecnosacerdote se escucha en toda la nave, resonando en todos los altavoces de voco de la cubierta.{/n} «He observado el vórtice del tiempo y visto oscuros presagios. Nos he visto a mí y a mis tecnocamaradas atrapados en el Ciclo, avanzando hacia la nada. He visto una maldición inevitable al final de la trayectoria y me he rebelado contra ella».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal legt den Kopf in den Nacken, und die Kraft in seiner Stimme ergießt sich wie eine Flut. Die dröhnende Stimme des Techpriesters ist auf dem gesamten Schiff zu hören, hallt aus jedem Vox-Lautsprecher auf jedem Deck.{/n} "Ich habe in den Vortex der Zeit geblickt und dunkle Omen gesehen. Ich habe gesehen, dass meine Techkamerad im Zyklus gefangen waren und aufs Nichts zutrieben. Ich habe am Ende dieser Bahn unvermeidlichen Untergang gesehen und dagegen rebelliert."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal throws back his head, and the power brimming in his voice rushes forth like a flood. The Tech-Priest's booming voice is heard throughout the ship, echoed by every vox-speaker on every deck.{/n} "I peered into the vortex of time and saw dark omens. I saw that my tech-comrades and I were trapped in the Cycle, spiralling toward nothingness. I saw inevitable doom at the end of that trajectory and rebelled against it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal legt den Kopf in den Nacken, und die Kraft in seiner Stimme ergießt sich wie eine Flut. Die dröhnende Stimme des Techpriesters ist auf dem gesamten Schiff zu hören, hallt aus jedem Vox-Lautsprecher auf jedem Deck.{/n} "Ich habe in den Vortex der Zeit geblickt und dunkle Omen gesehen. Ich habe gesehen, dass meine Techkamerad im Zyklus gefangen waren und aufs Nichts zutrieben. Ich habe am Ende dieser Bahn unvermeidlichen Untergang gesehen und dagegen rebelliert."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Başını geriye atan Pasqal'ın sesinden taşan kudret, sel misali yayılıyor. Tekno Rahip'in bütün güvertelerdeki voks hoparlörlerinde yankılanan gür sesi, geminin her yerinde duyuluyor.{/n} "Zamanın girdabına baktım, karanlık alametler gördüm. Tekno yoldaşlarımla benim Döngü'ye kısılıp kaldığımızı, hiçliğe doğru kıvrıldığımızı gördüm. Bu yolun sonunda kaçınılmaz bir yok oluş görüp ona başkaldırdım."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal throws back his head, and the power brimming in his voice rushes forth like a flood. The Tech-Priest's booming voice is heard throughout the ship, echoed by every vox-speaker on every deck.{/n} "I peered into the vortex of time and saw dark omens. I saw that my tech-comrades and I were trapped in the Cycle, spiralling toward nothingness. I saw inevitable doom at the end of that trajectory and rebelled against it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal başını geriye atıyor ve sesinden taşan kudret, bir sel gibi yayılıyor. Tekno Rahip'in gürleyen sesi bütün güvertelerdeki bütün voks hoperlörlerde yankılanıyor, gemi boyunca duyuluyor.{/n} "Zamanın girdabına baktım ve karanlık alametler gördüm. Tekno yoldaşlarımın ve benim Döngü'ye kısılıp kaldığımızı, hiçliğe doğru kıvrıldığımızı gördüm. Bu yolun sonunda kaçınılmaz bir yok oluş gördüm ve ona başkaldırdım."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
